inclusion.criterion: Women with first trimester failed pregnancy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: the age of 18 or over the age of 45
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: women who conceived via fertility treatments
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 42 year-old postmenopausal woman who had a screening sonogram which revealed an abnormality in the right breast. She had no palpable masses on breast exam.
